name: Soda Pop Paradise - New Bubble Shooter Speed Burst
name_original: Soda Pop Paradise - New Bubble Shooter Speed Burst
description:
Soda Pop Paradise is a deliciously soft and fruity world where the rivers are strawberry flavoured and ice cream is definitely on the menu! So jump on board, start up the fizzy pop machine and enjoy a bubblicious taste sensation roller coaster.

Aim those juicy fruity fizz bubbles to match 3 or more flavours together to clear the board. Carry on shooting those dreamy colours and win yourself a soda shot to blast all the bubbles in a rain of fruit heaven. Make your way through the yummiest land ever, travel past waterfalls of soda, walk through lime and lemon forests, swim in the ice cream islands dusted with chocolate cakes to arrive at the Soda Shop!

Challenge yourself with special timed levels to beat the clock, grab some cool soda aiming lines for those hard to reach fruits, or go for a super fired up fizz bomb to power through the soda bubbles.

So load up your fizzy pop machine and head straight for the Soda Shop!


Featuring:

- Free to play, fun challenging gaming
- 100 Levels of Fruity Soda adventure - more coming soon!
- Addictive match 3 Gameplay
- Leaderboards to track progress and share with your friends
- Super Aiming Lines for those hard to reach bubbles
- Special Timed Levels, Beat the clock!
- Share your Soda Scores on Facebook

Visit us Online:
